**{Information signs|RSC_5}** 

Information signs introduce or abolish a certain traffic regime, as well as inform road users about the location of settlements, various objects, areas where special rules apply.

{5.1 Motorway|RSS_5.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_1.png}. Road on which the special traffic conditions provided by section {27|TRT_27} of these Rules operate.
{5.2 "End of the Highway"|RSS_5.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_2.png}.
{5.3 "Road for cars"|RSS_5.3|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_3.png}. Road on which the special traffic conditions provided for in section {27|TRT_27} of these Rules apply (except for paragraph {27.3|TRI_27.3} of these Rules).
{5.4 "The end of the road for cars"|RSS_5.4|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_4.png}.
{5.5 "One-way road"|RSS_5.5|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_5.png}. Road or separate carriageway on which the movement of vehicles across the entire width is carried out only in one direction.
{5.6 "End of one-way road"|RSS_5.6|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_6.png}.
{5.7.1|RSS_5.7.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_7_1.png}, {5.7.2 "Departure on a one-way road"|RSS_5.7.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_7_2.png}. Indicate the direction of traffic on the intersecting road, if one-way traffic is organized on it. The movement of vehicles on this road or carriageway is allowed only in the direction indicated by the arrow.
{5.8 "Road with a lane for the movement of route vehicles"|RSS_5.8|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_8.png}. The road on which the movement of vehicles on the established route and cyclists is carried out on a specially allocated lane.
{5.9 "End of the road with a lane for the movement of route vehicles"|RSS_5.9|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_9.png}.
{5.10.1|RSS_5.10.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_10_1.png}, {5.10.2|RSS_5.10.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_10_2.png}, {5.10.3|RSS_5.10.3|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_10_3.png}, {5.10.4 "Exit to the road with a lane for the movement of route vehicles"|RSS_5.10.4 |https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_10_4.png}. Signs 5.10.3, 5.10.4 are used to indicate the exit to the road, where the movement of vehicles moving on the established routes is carried out by a specially designated lane marked by the sign {5.11|RSS_5.11|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_11.png}, along the general flow.
{5.11 "Lane for the movement of route vehicles"|RSS_5.11|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_11.png}. The lane is intended for the movement of vehicles moving on the established routes and cyclists, if the movement of such lane is carried out along the general flow of vehicles.
The effect of the sign extends to the lane over which it is installed. If the sign is installed to the right of the road, its effect extends to the right lane.
A driver who turns right on a road with a lane for route vehicles, separated by a dashed road marking line, is allowed to make a turn from this lane. In such places it is also allowed to drive on it when leaving the road and for boarding or disembarking passengers near the right edge of the carriageway.
{5.12 "End of the lane for the movement of route vehicles"|RSS_5.12|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_12.png}.
{5.13 "Road with reversible traffic"|RSS_5.13|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_13.png}. The beginning of a section of road on which one or more lanes may change direction.
{5.14 "End of the road with reverse traffic"|RSS_5.14|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_14.png}.
{5.15 "Departure on the road with reverse traffic"|RSS_5.15|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_15.png}.
{5.16 "Directions of traffic in the lanes"|RSS_5.16|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_16.png}. Shows the number of lanes at the intersection and the permitted directions of movement on each of them.
{5.17.1|RSS_5.17.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_17_1.png}, {5.17.2 "Lane direction"|RSS_5.17.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_17_2.png}.
{5.18 "Direction of movement in the lane"|RSS_5.18|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_18.png}. Shows the allowed direction of movement in the lane.
Sign 5.18 with an arrow depicting a turn to the left in a different way than provided by these Rules means that at a given intersection a turn to the left or a turn is made by leaving the intersection to the right and bypassing the flowerbed (dividing island) in the direction indicated by the arrow.
{5.19.1|RSS_5.19.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_19_1.png}, {5.19.2|RSS_5.19.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_19_2.png}, {5.19.3 "Lane Usage"|RSS_5.19.3|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_19_3.png}. Informs drivers about the use of the lane for the movement of only certain types of vehicles in these directions.
If the sign shows a sign prohibiting or allowing the movement of any vehicle, the movement of these vehicles on it, respectively, is prohibited or permitted.
{5.20.1|RSS_5.20.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_20_1.png}, {5.20.2 "Start of additional lane"|RSS_5.20.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_20_2.png}. 5.20.1 - indicates the beginning of an additional lane for lifting or braking lanes at traffic interchanges at one or different levels; 5.20.2 - indicates an additional lane on the left or the beginning of the braking lane in front of the intersection, intended for turning left or turning.
{5.21.1|RSS_5.21.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_21_1.png}, {5.21.2 "End of additional lane"|RSS_5.21.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_21_2.png}. Sign 5.21.1 indicates the end of the additional lane or acceleration lane, 5.21.2 - the end of the lane intended for movement in this direction.
{5.22 "Adjacent lane for acceleration of vehicles"|RSS_5.22|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_22.png}. The place where the acceleration lane is adjacent to the main lane at the same level on the right side.
{5.23 "Adjacent lane on the right"|RSS_5.23|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_23.png}. Indicates that the additional lane is adjacent to the main lane on the road on the right.
{5.24 "Minimum speed in different lanes"|RSS_5.24|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_24.png}.
{5.25 "Minimum lane speed"|RSS_5.25|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_25.png}.
{5.26 "Maximum speed limit in different lanes"|RSS_5.26|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_26.png} with the image of the sign {3.29 | RSS_3.29} sets the maximum speed in the lanes.
{5.27.1|RSS_5.27.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_27_1.png}, {5.27.2 "Changing the direction of traffic on the road with a dividing lane"|RSS_5.27.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_27_2.png}. Shows the direction of detour of the closed section of the carriageway on the road with a dividing strip or the direction of movement to return to the carriageway on the right.
{5.28 "Lane for emergency stop"|RSS_5.28|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_28.png}. Informs the driver about the location of the lane specially prepared for emergency stopping of vehicles in case of failure of the brake system.
{5.29 "Place for reversal"|RSS_5.29|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_29.png}. Indicates a place for turning vehicles. Turning to the left is prohibited.
{5.30 "Turning zone"|RSS_5.30|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_30.png}. Indicates the length zone for turning vehicles. Turning to the left is prohibited.
{5.31.1|RSS_5.31.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_31_1.png}, {5.31.2|RSS_5.31.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_31_2.png}, {5.31.3 "Direction of movement for trucks"|RSS_5.31.3|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_31_3.png}. Shows the recommended direction of travel for trucks and self-propelled vehicles.
{5.32.1|RSS_5.32.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_32_1.png}, {5.32.2|RSS_5.32.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_32_2.png}, {5.32.3 "Deadlock"|RSS_5.32.3|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_32_3.png}. Road that has no through passage.
{5.33 "Recommended speed"|RSS_5.33|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_33.png}. The area of the sign extends to the nearest intersection.
{5.34 "Residential area"|RSS_5.34|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_34.png}. Informs about the entrance to the territory where there are special traffic conditions provided by these Rules.
{5.35 "The end of the living area"|RSS_5.35|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_35.png}.
{5.36 Pedestrian Zone|RSS_5.36|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_36.png}. Informs about the features and conditions of traffic provided by these Rules.
{5.37 "End of the pedestrian zone"|RSS_5.37|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_37.png}.
{5.38.1|RSS_5.38.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_38_1.png}, {5.38.2 "Pedestrian crossing"|RSS_5.38.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_38_2.png}. Sign 5.38.1 is installed to the right of the road at the near border of the crossing, and sign 5.38.2 - to the left of the road at the far border of the crossing.
{5.39 "Diagonal Pedestrian Crossing"|RSS_5.39|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_39.png}. It is used only at adjustable intersections (where the traffic light signal is not switched to the yellow flashing mode), where the diagonal transition is allowed.
{5.40.1|RSS_5.40.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_40_1.png}, {5.40.2 "Underground Pedestrian Crossing"|RSS_5.40.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_40_2.png}.
{5.41.1|RSS_5.41.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_41_1.png}, {5.41.2 "Overground Pedestrian Crossing"|RSS_5.41.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_41_2.png}.
{5.42.1|RSS_5.42.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_42_1.png}, {5.42.2|RSS_5.42.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_42_2.png}, {5.42.3 "Parking space"|RSS_5.42.3|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_42_3.png}. It is used to mark places and parking lots for vehicles. Sign 5.42.2 indicates covered (underground and aboveground) parking lots.
Sign 5.42.3 indicates the places where a truck, van, etc. may stop, only for the time required for unloading / loading.
Sign 5.42.3 may be used with one of the plates {7.4.1|RSS_7.4.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_4_1.png} - {7.4.7|RSS_7.4.7|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_4_7.png}.
Signs 5.42.1, 5.42.2 with plates {7.28.1|RSS_7.28.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_28_1.png} - {7.28.4|RSS_7.28.4|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_28_4.png} indicate parking near metro stations and stops of route vehicles.
Sign 5.42.1 with the plate {7.5.9|RSS_7.5.9|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_5_9.png} is used to indicate parking lots for vehicles engaged in international road transport of goods.
Signs 5.42.1 and 5.42.2 may bear a reduced image of the plates to the road signs {7.5.9|RSS_7.5.9|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_5_9.png}, {7.6.1|RSS_7.6.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_6_1.png} - {7.6.7|RSS_7.6.7|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_6_7.png}, {7.14|RSS_7.14|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_14.png}, {7.17|RSS_7.17|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_17.png}, {7.23|RSS_7.23|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_23.png}, {7.28.1|RSS_7.28.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_28_1.png} - {7.28.4|RSS_7.28.4|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_28_4.png}, which characterize the conditions and specialization of the parking lot. The letter "P" can be shifted to the left.
{5.43 Parking Area|RSS_5.43|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_43.png}. Indicates the beginning of the zone where parking is allowed on the carriageway or along the carriageway, provided that they are indicated on the signs or additional plates below it.
Sign 5.43 with one of the plates {7.6.1|RSS_7.6.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_6_1.png} - {7.6.7|RSS_7.6.7|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_7_6_7.png} indicates the method of delivery of the car.
Sign 5.43 can be marked with signs to road signs.
{5.44 "End of the parking area"|RSS_5.44|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_44.png}. Indicates the end of the zone where parking is allowed.
{5.45.1 "Bus stop"|RSS_5.45.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_45_1.png}. The sign marks the beginning of the landing area of the bus moving along the established route.
{5.45.2 "End of the bus stop"|RSS_5.45.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_45_2.png}. Indicates the end of the bus landing.
{5.46.1 "Tram stop"|RSS_5.46.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_46_1.png}. Indicates the beginning of the tram landing pad.
{5.46.2 "End of tram stop"|RSS_5.46.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_46_2.png}. Indicates the end of the tram landing pad.

{5.66 "Route (road) number"|RSS_5.66|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_66.png}. Indicates the numbers of the route (road), approved in the prescribed manner.

{5.76 "Automatic video recording of violations of traffic rules"|RSS_5.76|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_76.png}. Indicates sections of roads where it is possible to control violations of traffic rules with the help of special technical and (or) technical means.
{5.77 "Sea (river) port or railway station"|RSS_5.77|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_77.png}. Location of the sea (river) port or railway station.

{5.78 "Radio stations transmitting traffic information"|RSS_5.78|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_78.png}. Indicates the sections of the road on which the radio station is received at the frequency indicated on the sign.
{5.79.1|RSS_5.79.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_79_1.png}, {5.79.2 "Emergency Exit"|RSS_5.79.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_79_2.png}. Location of emergency exits from the tunnel.

{5.82.1|RSS_5.82.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_82_1.png}, {5.82.2 "Toll Road"|RSS_5.82.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_82_2.png}. Inform road users about the availability of tolls on the road or a separate section of the road.
{5.83.1|RSS_5.83.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_83_1.png}, {5.83.2 "End of toll road"|RSS_5.83.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_83_2.png}.

{5.88 "Bicycle Strip"|RSS_5.88|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_88.png}. Marking of the bicycle lane allocated on the carriageway. {5.89 "End of the bike lane"|RSS_5.89|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_89.png}. The end of the lane for cyclists marked with sign 5.88.

{5.91 "End of the area for pedestrians and cyclists"|RSS_5.91|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_91.png}. The end of the designated area for the combined movement of pedestrians and cyclists.

{5.96.1 "Dimensional and weight control zone"|RSS_5.96.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_96_1.png}. 
{5.96.2 "End of dimensional and weight control zone"|RSS_5.96.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-signs/small/RSS_5_96_2.png}.

content.uk:
Дорожня розмітка є найпростішим та ефективним засобом організації дорожнього руху. Розмітка являє собою лінії, написи та інші позначення, що наносяться на проїзну частину, бордюри та елементи дорожніх споруд.

Дорожня розмітка допомогає водію орієнтуватися в дорожніх умовах, особливо під час руху в темну пору доби, коли водієві дуже складно залишатися на полосі руху під час зустрічного роз’їзду.

**{Горизонтальна розмітка|RMT_1}** 

Лінії горизонтальної розмітки мають білий колір. Синій колір має лінія {1.33|RMM_1.33|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_33.png}. Жовтий колір мають лінії {1.4|RMM_1.4|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_4.png}, {1.10.1|RMM_1.10.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_10_1.png} - {1.10.3|RMM_1.10.3|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_10_3.png}, {1.17.1|RMM_1.17.1|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_17.png} - {1.17.3|RMM_1.17.3|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_17_3.png}, {1.23|RMM_1.23|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_23.png}, {1.25|RMM_1.25|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_25.png}, а також лінії тимчасової розмітки. Червоно-білий колір мають лінії {1.14.2|RMM_1.14.2|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_14_2.png}, {1.14.3|RMM_1.14.3|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_14_3.png},{1.15|RMM_1.15|https://web.testpdr.com/storage/road-markings/small/RMM_1_15.png}.

content.ru:
Дорожная разметка является самым простым и эффективным средством организации дорожного движения. Разметка представляет собой линии, надписи и другие обозначения, наносимые на проезжую часть, бордюры и элементы дорожных сооружений.

Дорожная разметка помогает водителю ориентироваться в дорожных условиях, особенно при движении в темное время суток, когда водителю очень сложно оставаться на полосе движения во время встречного разъезда.
